name: Keerti Purswani
bio: Keerti Purswani is a dynamic computer science educator and founder of Educosys, specializing in data structures, algorithms, system design, and generative AI education. With a passion for making complex technical concepts accessible, Keerti has helped thousands of students excel in competitive programming, technical interviews, and real-world software engineering challenges. Her comprehensive approach combines hands-on practice with deep conceptual understanding, preparing students for careers at top tech companies.
teachingStyle: Hands-on project-based learning with live coding sessions, real-world case studies, and comprehensive doubt-clearing support
achievements: Founder of Educosys, a leading platform for tech education
Created comprehensive courses on DSA, System Design (HLD, LLD, HHLD), and Generative AI
Helped thousands of students secure placements at top tech companies through rigorous interview preparation
Known for breaking down complex algorithms and system design concepts into digestible, practical lessons
